product: Smart Anchor by Panasonic Plastic 6A Plug Adaptor (White)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
A Lifesaver for Limited Outlets!
body:
I recently purchased the Anchor by Panasonic 6A 3 Pin Multiplug Adapter with Universal Socket, and let me tell you, it's been a game-changer for me! Living with just one power socket on my side of the bed was always a hassle, especially when I needed to charge my phone, laptop, and power my night lamp simultaneously.This multiplug adapter came to the rescue, allowing me to connect all my devices at once without any hassle. The universal socket feature is incredibly convenient, accommodating various plug types effortlessly. The build quality feels sturdy, and I have peace of mind knowing that my devices are safe while charging.Not only does it effectively solve my power needs, but it also helps declutter the space around my bed. Now, I don't have to worry about tangled cords or limited outlets anymore.Overall, I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase. If you're facing a similar issue with limited outlets, I highly recommend investing in this multiplug adapter. It's a small investment that brings significant convenience and functionality to your daily life.

product: AllExtreme ‚ÄéCYL-06-T Multi-Purpose Bike Chain Cleaner Brush with Soft & Long Bristles Ideal for Quick Cleaning of Cycles, ...
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
AllExtreme ‚ÄéCYL-06-T Multi-Purpose Bike Chain Cleaner Brush - A Mixed Experience
body:
My experience with the AllExtreme ‚ÄéCYL-06-T Multi-Purpose Bike Chain Cleaner Brush has been a bit mixed, and here's why:Pros:Initial Effectiveness: The brush's soft and long bristles seemed promising for quick cleaning of my bike chain. It did manage to remove some dirt and grime initially.Cons:Durability Concerns: Unfortunately, my experience took a downturn when the brush came apart into three pieces during only the second time I used it. The design, which seems to be comprised of three separate pieces, felt like it wasn't well-constructed or durable.Build Quality: The fact that the brush's components were pasted together using a three-day piece design raised concerns about its long-term durability. It's disappointing to see a product fall apart so quickly.Final Verdict:the AllExtreme ‚ÄéCYL-06-T Multi-Purpose Bike Chain Cleaner Brush left me with mixed feelings. While the soft and long bristles showed some initial promise, the brush's durability concerns overshadowed its potential benefits. The fact that it came apart into three pieces during only the second use indicates that its construction and build quality might need improvement. When considering a bike chain cleaner brush, it's important to factor in both its effectiveness and longevity, and unfortunately, this product fell short in the latter category.

product: One94Store Study Lamp Rechargeable Led Touch On Off Switch Student Study Reading Dimmer Led Table Lamps White Desk Light L...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Perfect study lamp for students!
body:
The One94store Study Lamp is an excellent choice for students who need a reliable and versatile lamp for their study desk. This lamp is very easy to use, and it comes with a rechargeable battery that makes it convenient to move around.The touch on/off switch is a great feature that makes it easy to turn on the lamp with just a light tap. The dimmer function is also very useful for adjusting the brightness of the lamp according to my needs. The lamp produces a good amount of light, which is perfect for reading, writing, or studying.The design of the lamp is simple and elegant, and it comes in assorted colors to suit any style. The lamp is also very lightweight and compact, which makes it easy to carry around or store when not in use.The battery life of the lamp is impressive, and I can use it for several hours on a single charge. The charging time is also fast, which means I don't have to wait too long to use the lamp again.Overall, I would highly recommend the One94store Study Lamp to anyone who needs a reliable and versatile lamp for their study desk. It's a great value for the price, and it has all the features that students need for their daily study routine.

product: Zerfa¬Æ Washer Dryer Anti Vibration Pad with Suction Cup Feet, Fridge Washing Machine Support Feet Pads Leveling Feet Anti ...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
**Zerfa Washer Dryer Anti Vibration Pad with Suction Cup Feet Review**
body:
I've been using the Zerfa Washer Dryer Anti Vibration Pad with Suction Cup Feet for a few weeks now, and I'm really happy with it. It's made a big difference in reducing the noise and vibration from my washing machine.The suction power of the pads is very strong. They've stayed firmly in place on my washing machine even when it's running at full speed. The pads are also very effective at absorbing vibrations. I can barely hear my washing machine running now, and it doesn't shake the floor anymore.The pads are also very easy to clean. I just wipe them down with a damp cloth every few weeks. They're also dishwasher safe, so you can easily clean them if they get dirty.Overall, I'm very happy with the Zerfa Washer Dryer Anti Vibration Pad with Suction Cup Feet. It's a great way to reduce the noise and vibration from your washing machine. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a solution to this problem.Here are some of the pros and cons of the product:Pros:* Strong suction power* Effective at absorbing vibrations* Easy to clean* Dishwasher safe* Affordable priceCons:* The pads can be a bit difficult to get under the washing machine* The pads may not be suitable for all washing machinesOverall, I think the Zerfa Washer Dryer Anti Vibration Pad with Suction Cup Feet is a great product. It's effective at reducing noise and vibration, and it's easy to clean. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a solution to this problem.Here are some additional tips for choosing anti-vibration pads for your washing machine:* Make sure the pads are the right size for your washing machine.* Choose pads that are made from a durable material that can withstand the weight of your washing machine.* Look for pads that have a good suction power so they will stay in place.* Choose pads that are easy to clean.With these tips in mind, you should be able to choose the best anti-vibration pads for your washing machine.

product: Presto! 2 Ply Facial Tissue Box - 200 Pulls (Pack of 3)
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Good stuff! Go for the soft pack instead of the box.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Great value! Although, go for the soft poly pack because the quality of boxed packaging is rather flimsy. Save yourself the extra 30 rupees that you pay for the boxed tissues. Each tissue measures roughly 8 in. x 8 in. This is an Amazon brand so you often find it as part of daily or limited time deals. So do conduct a price watch.PROS:1. SOFT TEXTURE - Softer than the competition at the price. Very gentle on the skin.2.  HIGH ABSORPTION - Although thin, they soak liquid into their entire weight.3. CHEMICAL FREE - The manufacturers claim that the tissues are free from any chemicals that make the tissue appear whiter (OBAs - optical brightening agents.). So that's certainly a plus as contact with food shouldn‚Äôt raise your concern.4. ECONOMICAL - After using multiple dearer brands with fancier boxing, I can conclude that these are great value at the price.CONS1. BUY THE SOFT PACK - I paid extra 30 bucks to get the boxed tissues for the added convenience during extraction. Unfortunately, the boxes are poor quality, easily crushed during transport. Go for the soft, poly packs; enjoy the same quality tissues at a lesser price.

product: Presto! 2 Ply Facial Tissue Box - 200 Pulls (Pack of 3)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Detailed Product Review | After ~3 Years of Usage
body:
The Presto! 2 Ply Facial Tissue Box is a high-quality tissue paper product that offers excellent value for money. The pack comes with three boxes of 200 pulls each, making it a total of 600 pulls. The tissues are made of 100% virgin pulp, which makes them soft, strong, and absorbent. This means that you can use fewer tissues to get the job done, making them cost-effective in the long run.The 2-ply design of these tissues makes them durable and able to handle a variety of everyday messes, from sneezes and spills to wiping away makeup and dirt. They are also gentle on the skin, making them suitable for people with sensitive skin or allergies. The tissues come in a convenient box design that makes them easy to store and dispense.Compared to other tissue paper products in the market, the Presto! 2 Ply Facial Tissue Box offers great value for money. The price is competitive and affordable, especially considering the number of pulls per box. The tissues are also of high quality, and the 2-ply design makes them stronger and more durable than some other tissues in the same price range.Overall, the Presto! 2 Ply Facial Tissue Box is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a high-quality tissue paper product at an affordable price. It is suitable for use in homes, offices, and other settings where tissue paper is needed regularly. The tissues are soft, absorbent, and durable, making them a great value for money.

product: Bajaj DX-6 1000W Dry Iron with Advance Soleplate and Anti-bacterial German Coating Technology, White
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Bajaj DX-6 1000W Dry Iron: Unmatched Performance with Innovative Features
body:
I purchased the Bajaj DX-6 1000W Dry Iron, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. This appliance combines cutting-edge technology with a sleek design, making it an outstanding addition to my household.The first thing that caught my attention is the advanced soleplate with Anti-bacterial German Coating Technology. This feature not only ensures smooth gliding over fabrics but also provides an added layer of hygiene. It's reassuring to know that the iron is equipped with anti-bacterial properties, offering a clean and safe ironing experience.The 1000 Watts of power packed into this appliance is truly impressive. The heavy-duty performance of the Bajaj DX-6 ensures quick and efficient ironing, cutting down the time spent on this chore. Whether it's cotton, linen, or synthetics, this iron effortlessly handles various fabrics, leaving them perfectly pressed.The sleek and ergonomic design of the iron makes it comfortable to hold and maneuver. The temperature control is precise, allowing me to customize the heat according to the fabric I'm ironing. The Single Style operation simplifies the usage, making it user-friendly even for those who are not tech-savvy.The dimensions of 27L x 11W centimeters strike a perfect balance between compactness and functionality. It's easy to store, and the cord management ensures a clutter-free setup. The 240 Volts voltage specification ensures consistent performance, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction.Another noteworthy feature is the quick heating time, saving me valuable minutes in my daily routine. Whether I'm rushing in the morning or ironing a last-minute outfit for an evening event, the Bajaj DX-6 has proven to be a reliable companion.In conclusion, the Bajaj DX-6 1000W Dry Iron is a stellar product that combines power, efficiency, and innovative features. It has significantly improved my ironing experience, and I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of a high-performance dry iron. Bajaj has once again delivered a top-notch appliance that lives up to its reputation for quality and reliability.

product: Voltas 1.4 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC(Copper, Adjustable Cooling, Anti-dust Filter, 2023 Model, 173V Vectra Platina, White)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent AC, But Beware of Copper Pipe Limitations
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Rating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (4/5)Review:I recently purchased the Tata Voltas AC from Amazon, and overall, I am quite satisfied with its performance. The cooling capabilities are impressive, and it has made the scorching summer days bearable.The AC installation process, however, came with a minor hiccup. Amazon only provided a 3-feet copper pipe, which proved to be insufficient for my setup. Consequently, I had to purchase an external copper pipe, which incurred additional costs and a slight delay in the installation process. For those facing a similar situation, be prepared to shell out around 1k to 1.5k depending on your city for the extra copper pipe.Once the AC was up and running, it performed admirably. Even with daily usage of 10 to 12 hours at temperatures ranging from 22 to 24 degrees, my electricity bill increased by only around 3k for a period of two months. I find this energy efficiency quite commendable.The AC's cooling capacity is more than sufficient to cool a medium-sized room quickly. The noise level is relatively low, allowing for a peaceful environment during operation. The various modes and settings are user-friendly and easy to navigate, catering to different preferences and needs.The build quality of the Tata Voltas AC appears robust, and the remote control provided is functional and convenient. It's worth mentioning that the AC's aesthetics blend well with the room's decor, adding to its appeal.Despite the hiccup with the copper pipe, I can confidently recommend the Tata Voltas AC to potential buyers. It provides excellent cooling performance while maintaining energy efficiency, resulting in a comfortable and cost-effective solution for battling the summer heat. Just be prepared for the possibility of acquiring an external copper pipe during installation to ensure a smooth setup process.
Read more

product: Voltas 1.4 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC(Copper, Adjustable Cooling, Anti-dust Filter, 2023 Model, 173V Vectra Platina, White)
title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
An Unfortunate Experience: Voltas AC - A Tale of Terrible Product and ServicePathetic service üò°ü§¨
body:
Voltas AC - A NightmareUserWrite a review on voltas ac for their worst product and serviceI recently purchased a Voltas AC unit, and my overall experience has been nothing short of a nightmare. From the moment of purchase to the ongoing service, Voltas has proved to be a company that fails to meet even the most basic expectations. Allow me to elaborate on my experience, highlighting the various aspects that contributed to this abysmal encounter.Firstly, the product itself is far from satisfactory. The Voltas AC I purchased exhibited numerous issues right from the start. The cooling efficiency was extremely poor, and despite adjusting the temperature settings, it failed to create a comfortable indoor environment. The airflow was weak, making it ineffective in larger rooms. Additionally, the AC emitted a strange, unpleasant odor whenever it was running, indicating a potential problem with the unit's cleanliness or ventilation system. These issues not only hindered the AC's performance but also led to significant discomfort and inconvenience for me and my family.When it comes to customer service, Voltas proved to be utterly disappointing. Upon reporting the problems with the AC, I was met with a lengthy and frustrating process just to schedule a service appointment. The customer support team was unresponsive and lacked any sense of urgency or empathy. It took days of follow-up calls and emails before a technician was finally dispatched to address the issues. Even then, the technician arrived several hours late, causing further inconvenience and disruption to my daily routine.To my dismay, the service provided by the Voltas technician was subpar. Not only was the technician ill-prepared, but they also lacked the necessary expertise to diagnose and resolve the problems with the AC. Their attempts at troubleshooting were ineffective, and they seemed disinterested in finding a solution. As a result, I was left with an unresolved and malfunctioning AC unit, despite paying a premium price for a supposedly reputable brand.Moreover, the warranty offered by Voltas turned out to be nothing more than an empty promise. Despite the AC being well within the warranty period, the company refused to take responsibility for the faulty product and insisted on charging exorbitant fees for repairs. This blatant disregard for their own warranty terms left me feeling cheated and betrayed as a customer.In conclusion, my experience with Voltas AC has been an absolute nightmare. The product failed to deliver on its basic functionality, and the company's customer service was unresponsive, unprofessional, and unhelpful. The lack of accountability and willingness to address the issues adequately showcases a severe lack of commitment to customer satisfaction. I strongly advise potential buyers to steer clear of Voltas AC units, as they offer nothing but a frustrating and regrettable

product: Bajaj DMH 90 Neo 90L Desert Air Cooler for home with DuraMarine Pump (2-Yr Warranty), Antibacterial Honeycomb Pads, Powerf...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Decent product!
body:
Hi everyone,I have bought a Bajaj Neo 65L model and have received it by Amazon in just 2 days. I am writing this review just after one use of the air cooler. So firstly, when I received the box it seems  to be a little old condition but after unboxing the product the cooler was packed completely with cover and thermo sheet with decent quality. On box I noticed that cooler manufacturing date, which was 02/2024. It means the cooler was new and just 2 months old. Now let's talk about pro and cons. The one more thing that in this price range and brand won't get much in market. So I would suggest to go for it and use it as per your requirement.Pro: Yeah as per the details mentioned the fan power is powerful and at 1st point only throws good air, so if your room is 250-350 sqft area then it is more than enough. If you want to have huge then you may go for 90L. But this 65L looks big size and have wheels that can be attached to it for easy movement. The 4 castor wheels come in packaging which are inside the ice chamber of the top hood. The air flow is decent and doesn't seem any problem while using for first time. I hope at the 3rd speed won't be using much because the air flow is decent in at 1st low level.Cons:The horizontal vents which used to adjust air flow seem to be little hard to make it up/down because it has to do manually and it won't close completely incase the cooler is not for use, So might be chances that flies/mosquito may enter through it.Another thing that the water drain is at bottom and difficult to pull the knob, where if you want to remove any stagnant water remaining. So you may need an sponge or any good cloth to clean and space inside the cooler is very less, hardly your hand will reach any part inside. An healthy adult hand may not be reachable if want to clean inside the cooler.The adjustable knobs at top looks okay but speed of fan knob has the 3 speed control in which at first is top speed and then goes for 2nd & 1st. I don't know why Bajaj company have given that adjustable controls. Because most of the air cooler controls start from 1st then increas the level of speed.So this are all my observations over the air cooler but still try to use further and then could decide about its working and may give another review. title:

body:

It was packed by properly.Big downside of the cooler is uneven water distribution to the honeycomb pads and very difficult to remove reserve water in the tank, drain plug is situated in the bottom and it is very inconvenient.Quality of the drain plug is very poor.Plastic quality of the appliance is pretty poor.The cooler moves by itself due to functioning.Control knobs for swing, fan, pump is poor.Fan speed starts from 3 after it is power, which means it is logically designed poorly.Overall Bajaj or the third party manufacturer has to improve on the quality of knobs, even distribution of the water to the complete honeycomb pads, more rugged quality plastic, better side placement of the drain plug. Proper water level indication including the reserve capacity.

I'll summarise it as below:Pros-- can work continuously for hours together without trouble-- gives good level of cooling-- is easy to move & fill-- looks nice-- filling it fully once is sufficient for 6-8 hrs of useCons-- After a few weeks I am seeing something of a leak at the bottom. product: Bajaj DMH 90 Neo 90L Desert Air Cooler for home with DuraMarine Pump (2-Yr Warranty), Antibacterial Honeycomb Pads, Powerf...
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
Overall good value for money.
body:
I found this cooler much useful for me. I'm happy for the money I spent on this cooler. few Cons I notice with this cooler.- there is no lock in castor wheel causing cooler to move sometimes.- Ice chamber is somewhat 1 liter capacity.  for 90 liters water capacity, 1 liter ice doesn't make any sense.- cooler deflectors doesn't close completely. concerning accumulation of dust or mosquito breading when not in use.- auto swing deflectors are positioned closer to fan. thus, air deflection angle is less then compared to other brand coolers.- colling pads has no mosquito net towards outer side. again, concerning accumulation of dust or mosquito breading when not in use.- control nobs are somewhat wobbly.- power cord is small in length.pros:- fan is fast enough for the given Moter wattage.- fan is of plastic causing lesser load on Moter during operational.- operational sound is ok for me.- water pump is of superior quality.- back cooling pad is closer to fan, causing air suction effect from back side.- power cables and internal water pipe quality is superior.- cooling pads are well positioned there is no water leak/flow to outside from cooling pads when pump is on.- cooler size is slim compared with other brands in same category.other suggestions- product capability can be increased by added timer functionality for pump, fan speed etc.

product: MMT ACOUSTIX Door Seal Tape/Strip | Self Adhesive Window & Door Soundproof tape
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Will surely save you from ill mannered neighbours
body:
I recently installed a soundproofing door strip in my home, and I must say, it has made a remarkable difference in reducing noise transmission between rooms. This simple yet effective solution has exceeded my expectations in terms of its performance and ease of installation.The door strip is constructed from high-quality materials designed specifically for sound insulation. Its dense foam core effectively absorbs and dampens sound vibrations, preventing noise from passing through the gap between the door and the frame.Installation was a breeze, requiring just a few minutes and basic tools. The adhesive backing securely adhered the strip to the door frame, creating a tight seal that effectively blocks out unwanted noise. Plus, the strip is adjustable to fit doors of various sizes, ensuring a custom fit for maximum soundproofing effectiveness.Since installing the soundproofing door strip, I've noticed a significant reduction in noise transfer between rooms. Loud conversations, television noise, and even traffic sounds from outside are now muffled to a much more tolerable level. This has greatly improved the overall tranquility and privacy of my home, allowing me to enjoy peace and quiet whenever I need it.In addition to its impressive soundproofing capabilities, the door strip also helps with energy efficiency by sealing gaps that can lead to drafts and heat loss. This added benefit not only enhances comfort but also contributes to cost savings on heating and cooling bills.Overall, I couldn't be happier with the performance of the soundproofing door strip. Its effectiveness, ease of installation, and additional energy-saving benefits make it a must-have for anyone looking to create a quieter, more comfortable living environment. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking an affordable and practical solution for sound insulation.
Read more

product: Samsung 28 L Convection Microwave Oven (MC28A5013AK/TL, Black, Curd Anytime)
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Curd making is useless
body:
Pros:Attractive Design: The Samsung Curd-Making Microwave boasts a sleek and modern design that blends well with my kitchen decor.User-Friendly Interface: The microwave's control panel is intuitive, making it easy to set the desired temperature and time for food preparation.Customizable Settings: It offers a range of temperature and time settings, allowing you to tailor the food-making process to your preference.Reliable Performance: The microwave consistently maintains the set temperature throughout the food-making process, ensuring the food cooks properly.Cons:Extremely Slow: The most significant drawback of this microwave is the exorbitant amount of time it takes to make curd. The advertised six-hour duration is not an exaggeration. In today's fast-paced world, waiting for curd to set for such an extended period is impractical and frustrating.Limited Capacity: The microwave's capacity for curd-making is also quite limited, which can be a hindrance if you need to prepare a substantial quantity of curd.Inefficient Energy Use: Operating the microwave for six hours consumes a significant amount of energy, which is not environmentally friendly.In conclusion, while the Samsung Curd-Making Microwave offers an attractive design, user-friendly interface, and reliable performance, its excruciatingly long curd-making time and limited capacity outweigh these advantages. Making curd should be a hassle-free experience, and this microwave fails to deliver on that front. Unless you have an abundance of time and patience to sp

title:

Excellent Quality Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster
body:
I recently ordered the Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster with Double Side Tape, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed. Here's why I think this product is exceptional:**Superb Picture Quality:** The first thing that caught my attention was the outstanding picture quality of these posters. The charts are crisp, clear, and the colors are vibrant. It's evident that great care has been taken in their production.**Strong Adhesive:** The double-sided tape provided with the posters is of excellent quality. It adheres well to the walls and holds the posters securely in place. I haven't had any issues with posters falling off or peeling away from the walls.**Aesthetic Appeal:** These charts not only serve as valuable tools for traders and investors but also add a touch of sophistication to the room. They look fantastic on the walls, and the multicolor design adds a pleasant visual element to the decor.**Informative Content:** The charts themselves are packed with valuable information for traders and investors. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, having these patterns displayed prominently serves as a constant reminder of key concepts and strategies.Overall, I couldn't be happier with this purchase. These posters are more than just decorative; they are educational and practical tools for anyone interested in the stock market. The combination of superb picture quality, strong adhesive, and aesthetic appeal makes them a top-notch choice. I highly recommend the Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster with Double Side Tape to anyone looking to enhance their trading or investment environment.

product: QUBO 16A Smart Plug from Hero Group | Energy Monitoring, Suitable for large appliances like ACs, Geysers & Water Pumps (Vo...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Easy Control, Great Functionality: Qubo Smart Switch Review
body:
I recently installed a Qubo smart switch in my home and I'm really impressed with its features and usability. Here's what I like most:Remote Control:  Being able to turn electronics on and off from anywhere using the Qubo app is a game-changer. No more worrying if I left the iron on or rushing home to turn off lights.Scheduling:  I love that I can set schedules for my lights and appliances. This is perfect for automating routines or creating the illusion of someone being home when I'm away.Voice Control:  The Qubo switch works seamlessly with Alexa and Google Assistant. Using voice commands to control lights is surprisingly convenient, especially for hands-free moments.Energy Monitoring:  An unexpected bonus is the ability to track energy consumption through the app. This helps me identify power-hungry appliances and adjust usage accordingly.Great UI: I have used many smart home products in the past, I can easily say that Qubo's UI is the best among them and fun to navigate.Overall, the Qubo smart switch is a well-designed and functional product that adds convenience and a touch of automation to my smart home.  If you're looking for an easy-to-use smart switch with great features, then the Qubo is a definite recommendation.Here are a couple of things to consider:The Qubo switch requires a Wi-Fi connection for full functionality.While the app is user-friendly, setting up the switch might take a few minutes for non-tech-savvy users.Despite these minor points, I believe the Qubo smart switch offers excellent value for its features and ease of use.
Read more

It doesn't work with my mobile having android version 7. Manufacturer should pay attention to modify the software so that it can be operated by mobile of lower android version 5

product: QUBO 16A Smart Plug from Hero Group | Energy Monitoring, Suitable for large appliances like ACs, Geysers & Water Pumps (Vo...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Awesome device, easy installation & setup
body:
I recently purchased the Qubo Smart Plug 10 amp, and it has proven to be a valuable addition to my smart home setup. Here's my review:Ease of Setup:Setting up the Qubo Smart Plug was a breeze. The accompanying app provided clear instructions, and I had it connected to my home network within minutes. The process was straightforward, even for someone not very tech-savvy.Compatibility:I appreciate the broad compatibility of the Qubo Smart Plug. It seamlessly integrates with popular smart home ecosystems, making it easy to control through voice commands or dedicated apps.Performance:The 10-amp capacity of this smart plug is perfect for handling various devices around the house. Whether it's lamps, small appliances, or electronics, the Qubo Smart Plug reliably controls the power supply, adding a new level of convenience to my daily routine.App Features:The accompanying app offers a range of features that enhance the overall user experience. Scheduling, remote control, and energy monitoring are particularly useful, allowing me to optimize power usage and ensure that devices are only active when needed.Build Quality:The Qubo Smart Plug feels robust and well-built. The design is sleek, and it doesn't obstruct neighboring outlets, which is a common concern with some bulkier smart plugs.Reliability:In my experience, the Qubo Smart Plug has been highly reliable. I haven't encountered any connectivity issues or malfunctions since its installation. It responds promptly to commands, whether given through the app or voice control.Value for Money:Considering its features and performance, the Qubo Smart Plug provides excellent value for money. It's a cost-effective solution for anyone looking to make their home a bit smarter without breaking the bank.Conclusion:Overall, the Qubo Smart Plug 10 amp has exceeded my expectations. Its ease of use, compatibility, and reliable performance make it a standout choice in the smart plug market. If you're looking to enhance the automation capabilities of your home, I highly recommend giving the Qubo Smart Plug a try.
Read more

product: QUBO 16A Smart Plug from Hero Group | Energy Monitoring, Suitable for large appliances like ACs, Geysers & Water Pumps (Vo...
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
App is a nightmare
body:
Pros: excellent build, sturdy, elegant, reasonable price, Made in India!Cons: As several others have noted the device's wifi reception range is too small (~8ft), so be sure to plug it very near to WiFi source when setting up and using it. And it only works with 2.4Ghz (not 5Ghz). The App is another nightmare, the setup process failed several times until it was successful. product: QUBO 16A Smart Plug from Hero Group | Energy Monitoring, Suitable for large appliances like ACs, Geysers & Water Pumps (Vo...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Works very well.
body:
This wifi enabled smart plug arrived in good condition in its packaging. It was very easy to set up and use. It recognised and connected to home wifi without any problems. Entire setup process took about 5 minutes only. Though alexa compatibility is mentioned, I am not using it. It has been working for 3 months now and has no problems. I waited for 3 months , continuously using 2 of these smart plugs, before giving my review on the product.The associated Qubo app is user friendly. I am happy with the all-in-one app. The app also  helps me to check power consumption of the connected device and also has a feature for scheduling on-off timings. I can remotely schedule the exhaust fan to switch on and off automatically everyday at a given time without having to do it manually each day. I am able to control exhaust fans and drive way lights in remote location through my mobile phone using this plug. The app also has a feature for checking trend of power consumption by the connected device in the form of a graph over a period of time.I would rate this smart plug 5 stars. Highly recommend it. Very good value for money.
Read more

product: Milton Atlantis 900 Thermosteel Water¬†Bottle, 750 ml, Orange
title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
Avoid buying if you need something that will last longer.
body:
Avoid buying if you need something that will last longer.Pro:Good for the short-term life cycle.The liquid stays cold for 2 days though the temperature decreases slowly when the liquid reduces, or else if it's still full then the liquid stays cold for a long time.Cons:Expensive for a short-term life cycleFlawed cap design, the cap hing holder is made of low-quality plastic, so expect it to break in 3-6 months of continuous use.No warranty on the replacement caps sent. (if your bottle warranty expires after the cap was sent, the cap will no longer be covered under warranty)Replacement cap after warranty is almost half the price of the original bottle priceThe customer care support via email takes a very long time to respond.In short, if you want something that will last longer for the price range, then don't buy this product. I purchased two of these bottles and both had the same issue with the cap. The cap initially starts chipping off and then finally breaks and the hook can no longer be held by the cap and the cap stays open.As a consumer, I am really disappointed with this product and I wish Milton would recall all these bottles or replace them with better quality caps.

body:
I recently purchased the OREI Universal Travel Adapter, and it has exceeded my expectations. The quality of the adapter is impressive; it feels sturdy and well-constructed, which gives me confidence in its durability for all my travels. Its versatility is one of its standout features, as it effortlessly adapts to various plug types across multiple countries, making it a reliable companion for international trips. Additionally, the ease of use is remarkable ‚Äì it's intuitive to switch between different plug configurations, and the compact design ensures it doesn't take up much space in my luggage. Overall, the OREI Universal Travel Adapter is a top-notch product that I highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable, versatile, and easy-to-use travel adapter.

product: SignoraWare Ice Cube tray with TPE Easy Release base with Removable Lid | Pop-Up 14 Cubes Box for Freezer | Easy Re-fillin...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Must have if you use ice often
body:
I once cut my hand trying to remove ice from a traditional tray (that comes with the fridge) while tapping it roughly (and it broke) on the table trying to get the cubes out. This is when I got my first silicone bottomed ice tray from a local store and was so impressed by the ease of removal of ice. I needed a second tray and I got this one which is a little different. I was skeptical if the silicone button mechanism would work as well as the full silicone bottom of my previous purchase. Happy to note that it works just as well. If your tray is extremely frozen, wait a few seconds and then turn the tray upside down on a table and press the silicone with the heel of your hand. This will get the ice out. The plastic quality also seems quite hard and sturdy. The lid is a little less thick but I think that prevents it from sticking to the tray and making it difficult to open. It's really so, so easy to remove ice for drinks.Will update if anything changes.

product: Teko Craft - Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster with Double Side Tape, Trading Chart Poster, Trading Setup for Trader Inve...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent Quality Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster
body:
I recently ordered the Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster with Double Side Tape, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed. Here's why I think this product is exceptional:**Superb Picture Quality:** The first thing that caught my attention was the outstanding picture quality of these posters. The charts are crisp, clear, and the colors are vibrant. It's evident that great care has been taken in their production.**Strong Adhesive:** The double-sided tape provided with the posters is of excellent quality. It adheres well to the walls and holds the posters securely in place. I haven't had any issues with posters falling off or peeling away from the walls.**Aesthetic Appeal:** These charts not only serve as valuable tools for traders and investors but also add a touch of sophistication to the room. They look fantastic on the walls, and the multicolor design adds a pleasant visual element to the decor.**Informative Content:** The charts themselves are packed with valuable information for traders and investors. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, having these patterns displayed prominently serves as a constant reminder of key concepts and strategies.Overall, I couldn't be happier with this purchase. These posters are more than just decorative; they are educational and practical tools for anyone interested in the stock market. The combination of superb picture quality, strong adhesive, and aesthetic appeal makes them a top-notch choice. I highly recommend the Stock Market Chart Patterns Poster with Double Side Tape to anyone looking to enhance their trading or investment environment.

product: Xergy 10 cm 3D Rechargeable Moon Lamp with Touch Control Adjust Brightness Moon Light with Wooden Stand 3D Print for Diwal...
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
After two months of occasional use
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Pros:1. The product looks super cool. When you light it and just relax to some music, the feeling is divine. Brightness is good. Gives a romantic and relaxing feeling. If you use it during a romantic session with your partner - oh my god, she's gonna give you so much in return.2. So many colours and effects makes it not-boring and suitable to different moods.3. Rechargeable and battery seems to last long for each charge.4. Portable5. Very easy to use6. Using occasionally for two months. Durability looks good.Cons:1. I got the 15 cm remote controlled variant for 1100 rupees, which seems a little too much. 750-800 seems a fair price considering how little the production cost is once you break-even. So I wouldn't exactly call it a value for money.2. The wooden stand doesn't stay in place properly if you lift it or move. So I wouldn't recommend holding the entire thing from wooden stand. Pick up the moon separately and the wooden stand separately when moving it to another place. (But don't worry - the stand is functional, meaning it holds the moon properly when placed on it)3. Has their own charging pin. It would've been fantastic if they used type-C USB port or micro-USB port so that even if their cable goes missing or stops working, the product itself is not useless after that.4. There's a texture on the surface, so keep it covered by some cloth when not using, else removing the dust will be a bit difficult.Verdict - 4 stars. Removing one star for being expensive and not using a commonly used charging port. The port issue is too big a cause of concern for me. Could've given even 3 stars, but the pros outweigh the cons. Consider somewhere around 3.8 starts from me.
Read more

product: Rewup Table fan Powerful Rechargeable Table Fan with LED Light, Table Fan for Home, Table Fans, Table Fan for Office Desk,...
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
An average buy for the price
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Overall, I found the fan to have some great features, but there were also some notable drawbacks.One of the biggest pros of this fan is its lightweight design. It's easy to move around and can be placed on any table or desk without taking up too much space. Additionally, the fan runs quietly, which is great for those who want to use it in a bedroom or office setting without disturbing others.Another positive aspect of this fan is the light on the inside. This is a unique feature that adds a nice touch to the overall design and can be useful if you need a little extra light in a dark room.However, there are some significant cons to this fan as well. The biggest issue is that it takes a very long time to recharge and the battery only lasts for about an hour. This means that if you want to use the fan for an extended period of time, you have to keep it connected to a power supply at all times.Furthermore, the charging process is so slow that you can't use the fan while it's charging. This can be frustrating if you need to use the fan immediately but it's not fully charged yet.Overall, I would recommend this fan for those who need a lightweight and quiet option for short-term use. However, if you're looking for a fan that can be used for longer periods of time without needing to be constantly connected to a power source, this may not be the best option for you.

product: Godrej 30 L Qube Personal Standard Single door Cooling Solution (TEC Qube 30L HS Q103, Black)
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
As per the authorized service person, This unit should always be powered ON. If not it fails!!
body:
Dear Amazon support team,Greetings !!I wish to share my not so positive experience with the purchase of one product on Amazon. I would like to know if anything could be done from your side, that would help me.I purchased a GODREJ 30 litre CUBE refrigerator on 21.06.2021 (Invoice copy enclosed for your ref.,)It was intended for keeping the medicines of my aged in-laws. It worked perfectly all right for almost a year. As we had to go out of home for a month, the unit was switched off. After returning home after a month‚Äôs time, the unit was not working properly and it did not get cool at all.The service engineer from M/s Godrej analysed and informed us that the cooling engine has failed and it has to be replaced at a cost of Rs.4000/- He also stated that the unit should never be turned OFF and always should be in ON condition. Because we had kept it in OFF condition for a month, the failure has occurred. This condition was never mentioned in any of the literature provided with the unit.Amazon site states that this unit is user installable and engineer will not come for installation. But the service engineer from M/s GODREJ told that if the unit was purchased from a GODREJ dealer, service engineer would have come and explained this cause to the user. Because of our purchase of this unit through AMAZON, we had no option of knowing this technical issue.As a Prime member and having purchased two laptops costing a lakh rupees each and a host of other costly electronic gadgets on amazon, I feel cheated by this heavy financial loss.I request you to kindly give priority and analyze my case thoroughly  and provide me a favourable solution, which will augment my higher regards I have for AMAZON.
Read more

product: Godrej 30 L Qube Personal Standard Single door Cooling Solution (TEC Qube 30L HS Q103, Black)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Authorized technicians seem to know that Gorej Qube cooling engine is bad
body:
Dear Amazon Support team,Much like Mr. K Vijaykumar's review from 17th Sept 2022, my cooling unit too got busted a right after 1 year warranty period got over. And the authorized service people seem to know exactly why. The Godrej Qube cooling unit is faulty.My 1 year warranty got over on 18th April 2023, 10 days ago.2 months ago, on 26th February, the cooling stopped. I raised service request. The technician cleverly came, cleaned the dust from cooling unit to resume the cooling temporarily, and left without diagnosing anything.A week after 18th April, I had to raise request again for same issue. This time the technicians came directly with 4000/- Rs cooling unit, ready to install it if I pay up again. No diagnosis done as yet. I was offered a 6 month warranty on that unit too, more if I did AMC with them. This was unsealed unit.I reported this to customer care. Ms. Akanksha from customer care from Godrej spoke to me on Thursday 27th April and assured to help me, saying you won't have to pay up anymore. On Friday 28th April, she refused we ever had a conversation. Thankfully I have all the records to prove this. On email, they don't reply  [ Godrej request number : 322288 ]It's a highly disturbing trend where Amazon customers are being betrayed by such practices on part of Godrej. Please help us out.
Read more

product: Godrej 30 L Qube Personal Standard Single door Cooling Solution (TEC Qube 30L HS Q103, Black)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent innovative product
body:
A very innovative and useful product.  It has been the talk of people visiting and they were very keen in buying for themselves.  Remember that this is NOT a fridge and will NOT cool or refrigerate items. Food especially requires temparature to be maintained at 4 degrees C or below.  This unit will maintain temp at 8 - 10 degrees Centigrade. It is ideal for keeping soft drink cans, Beer cans, curd, fruit juice, eggs etc cool. Do NOT store any cooked / food items as it will get spoiled .  Can store milk packets and boiled milk overnight, but not long term.  Butter/cheese cannot be stored as it required to be stored at 4* C or lower.  Size is very compact and it looks very attractive.  The innovative technology of cooling ensures cooling without a refrigeration compressor, so not water dripping or need to defrost.  It make a bit of humming noise which is normal.  Ideal for Kitchen, Bedroom, Bar etc.

title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
Worst Product - NO Quality Checks / just sending products to dump on us
body:
After searching a lot for a good and budget friendly Dust bin with a pedal, I thought this one suits our needs. I also was impressed with the Made In India tag seen. But all that time was wasted when a dustbin arrived which didn‚Äôt have a pedal push button AT ALL.The lid is very flimsy too and can come out anytime sooner.I had to return this product. Kuber brand has disappointed me. Made In India tag should give a lasting impression of reliability henceforth please make sure and enhance India‚Äôs reputation and don‚Äôt mfr such defective products and dump on us. I also blame the seller here for their RUN OF THE MILL SELLING APPROACH without even checking what they are sending.For other Kuber plastic products ordered from Amazon too, the Colours / Models were different but we were too exhausted to return each and every item as at least they could be used somehow, but this one is a disaster with no Pedal attachment.

product: Whirlpool 245 L 3 Star Frost-Free Inverter Double Door Refrigerator (NEO DF258 ROY GERMAN STEEL (3S-N, German Steel, 2022 ...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Best Buy!!! Awesome
body:
I'm writing this review after using the refrigerator for a month, coz wanted to give a genuine review. I bought this in the Prime member sale July 2022, which was also the launch of this product wherein there was no reviews. I took a chance and bought this Whirlpool refrigerator and i would say that this is the BEST refrigerator to buy in terms of all features right from the Price, storage capacity, cooling & design. The timely installation from Whirlpool is very good. Infact this was one of the main reason for me to choose whirlpool brand, since their service reach is very good.One more thing I wanted to highlight about this product and whirlpool is that, they never asked to write a review about the product though this is new launch in July'22, wherein the other leading brands ask the customers to do so. This is really good of them.I would also like to give some tips:1. At the time of delivery, ask the delivery executive for the open box installation.  The delivery executive may refuse to do so. Even the person who delivered to me wasn't ready to do. But unless and until if they don't do, do not share the OTP coz Amazon has given the clear instruction for the open box installation.2. The product may be shaky once opened but do not worry. It will be adjusted by the whirlpool technician as per the ground level. Infact I was also worried, but it was all solved by the knowledgeable whirlpool installation technician.3. On Time installation. The whirlpool technical team contacts immediately the next day for installation which is really perfect and the technician is also thorough professional with depth knowledge on what they are doing and also on time.At last, I would say Amazon customer service team is awesome. They hear to our queries and take necessary steps to resolve.  Not only that, they also make sure that they follow up to make sure the query has been resolved or not.So overall a very good product at this price range. YOU CAN GO FOR THIS REFRIGERATOR WITHOUT SECOND THOUGHT!
Read more

Well as I have no other choice I call for service the guy who came for service he also brought his RM or ASM not sure, where he blamed me that we did a mistake so why it‚Äôs leaking and he claims that we don‚Äôt know how to use the fridge which is very rude. product: Amazon Brand - Solimo 650 Watt Drip Coffee Maker with Borosilicate Carafe
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Good value for a well finished product - recommended
body:
I have been using a similar coffee percolator for over 20 years now - and my old workhorse, a Chinese (Nova) is still capable. Since it was white, and therefore a very unappetising sight now, I needed a new one.Packaging: The design of packaging was perfect - stiff corrugated sandwich board box, foam profiled panels stuck on board for bottom and top, board wrapping around the glass kettle, the whole unit inside a thick ply cover. Frankly, this sort of packaging is more common in high end audio equipment. 5 * plus for the packaging design.Size: This is a small machine - and will make about 600 ml of coffee - sufficient for 2 mugs in one go. If you need a larger volume - look elsewhere.Body and finish: The plastic body is well made - the matte finish looks good. The bottom metal plate is seamless and black - will have to wait and see when spots appear. The kettle is good quality glass, and though no branding is present, feels thick enough to withstand minor washing bumps. The filter bucket and the holder with the flow control spring is OK - hopefully the spring and washer - which are fixed - will last. The lid moves smoothly and the hinges and the sprinkler also look sturdy. Switch is firm.Function: It worked very well on the first use. I had used an extra coffee filter paper on top of the nylon filter bucket. The flow was smooth. Coffee liquor starts weak, and then picks up strength. The drip stops well with the removal of the kettle - and though the manual cautiously states a 10 sec gap for drip stop, I did not find any leakage on longer removal.Overall: Very satisfied with my new coffee maker. Recommend buying.
Read more

product: Amazon Brand - Solimo 650 Watt Drip Coffee Maker with Borosilicate Carafe
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Overall works very well
body:
A nice little, affordable coffee maker. I have used Drip-Coffee Makers for years, so I know how this one lines up with others.*The carafe needs to be fully straight and centered with even the handle in the middle for the coffee to come out correctly, but that is easy enough after a few attempts.*The only negative comment that I have on it really is the reusable filter that came with it. The bottom of it is solid rather than mesh, meaning that the water cannot drip through the bottom but only through the sides. This results strangely enough in weaker coffee than using a similar-sized coffee pot with a mesh bottom to the filter, so I wind up using one TBSP of coffee more with this than I do when making the same amount of coffee in a different coffee maker.  So if you have this coffee maker, you might want to replace that part with another similarly sized one from another brand (or use paper filters instead of the reusable ones).Otherwise, it's a great little coffee maker - perfect for the office at our language school.

product: HealthSense Kitchen Scale (Steel Grey)
title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
Stopped working after 4 months, elegant but sorta unintuitive.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Let's start with the great things - as a designer myself, I do really appreciate the great look and feel of the product, and its sleekness. Unfortunately, UX-wise, one gripe with it is that there's no way to manually turn it off and the only way for it to power-down is to wait for 2 straight minutes, *making sure the weight values doesn't change* but that can be challenging since it is sensitive to the slightest of air-currents (which is a good thing by design, but also results in unnecessary battery drain).What really broke the deal for me is when I realised that one fine evening, after almost exactly 4 months of *very spare* and careful usage; it just wouldn't turn on anymore. Changed the batteries, however, to no avail. It's basically dead, which makes it unreliable for the long-run.It's a great product, but it clearly has QC/QA issues.Have submitted a support ticket to Health Sense's website since the product is under warranty.Will update after a resolution, if it ever comes.
Read more

product: HealthSense Kitchen Scale (Steel Grey)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
My recipes are accurately measured now
body:
I bought this scale precisely for kitchen application. Recently, I started my experiments with baking at home, and this scale is my perfect companion for measuring ingredients accurately for all the recipes.Its operation is easy. Just switch it on and start measuring.My only gripe about the unit is that it doesn't show accurate weights in fractions; for example, from a gram, it will jump to two grams, not a gram and a half. However, for my application, a fraction of a gram isn't as critical as a jewellery maker, so I am okay with this tiny inaccuracy.I hope it lasts long because it looks adequately sturdy.

product: KENT Ultra Storage UV Water Purifier (11042) | UV+UF Water Purification | Wall Mountable | 8L Storage | 60 L/hr Output | W...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent product for sweet water area or water supply. Full information read this review.
body:
I received the product recently. I will give some information about sweetness of water after a prolonged study of many years. (TDS is Total Dissolved Solids)TDS... 20- 50 packaged drinking waterTDS... 50-100 RO water (recommended)TDS...100-300 water tastes sweet ( no RO is required, only UV UF water filter required)TDS...300-500 water has no  taste just neutral ( no RO is required, only UV UF water filter required)TDS...500 and above water tastes salty and its hard water (RO is required to bring down the TDS)If you are BUDGET oriented then this UV UF filter is HIGHLY recommended. The most important part in this water filter is UF filter cartridge. This UF cartridge contains small hair like strands which are about 0.001 micron thick (thickness of a hair strand is 50-60 micron)  and which filters all bacterias BUT not viruses. The viruses and the bacterias are killed or become dormant i.e the viruses can not multiply in other words they are damaged completely  by the UV lamp.In other cheap filters the UF filter is made from a tightly fitted sponge like material which does not filter bacterias but only filters suspended particles like a pre-filter cartridge. so this is the main difference between branded and other cheap filters.All branded filters are standard but KENT is reasonable and efficient and Amazon delivers with utmost care.KENT has made a name for itself since years BUT their after sales service is so costly and so inefficient, you can buy another new filter from a different branded company. Here there is a KENT dealer who sells refurbished filters and other cheap filters and if you ask for KENT he sells them at 30% more than what is available online and no free installation. you will have to pay a 200-500 rupees depending on how far is your home from their office.In my opinion you BUY from amazon and install yourself by following procedures on youtube videos or ask any plumber to install it for you for 50-100rs OR contact amazon, they will send an authorized local agent for installation without any expenses. But while the agent is installing do not allow him to open the top kent cover even if its RO installation.Thanks to amazon.
Read more

product: KENT Ultra Storage UV Water Purifier (11042) | UV+UF Water Purification | Wall Mountable | 8L Storage | 60 L/hr Output | W...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Perfect for municipal water
body:
The permissible Total dissolved solids(TDS) limits for safe drinking water have been described to be not more than 300mg/l or not less than 50mg/l. The recent advanced water purifiers are actually going above and beyond by putting needless purification processes which are removing the minimum tds from the water depriving them of essential nutrients. The municipal water that we get from most of the cities maintain the standards ensuring the permissible tds limits which may just require a decontamination at the most which this mission does perfectly enough. UV rays are scientifically used to get rid of all the bacterial, fungal and other pathogen infestations whcih should be enough for the water.

product: Curaze Weight Machine for Home Kitchen (10 kg, Larger, More Sturdy, Silver)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Sleek, accurate weighing machine; brilliant customer service!
body:
Mistakes will happen, but great customer service is about how gracefully you recover. And I am blown away by GoTrippin!On Mon 10 PM, I found that the Curaze weighing machine delivered to me was defective. I raised a replacement request, thinking it would take at least a week. Imagine my shock and delight when a brand new machine was delivered by 5 PM on Tue, <20 hrs later!And the new piece is perfect:* Accurate to within 1-2 g* Measurement is consistent across multiple tries* Works well at both ends of the scale -- low (10 to 250 g) and high (8+ kilos)* Zero/tare function works well* Backlighting is useful (although viewing angles could be better)* Easy to switch between units from grams > kilos > pounds > ounces* Touch controls are intuitive and easy to operate* Scale surface is big enough to place a large-sized Dan Brown hardcover (sideways)* Looks really cool!Comes with a pair of AAA batteries, a thoughtful little gesture so you don't have to go raid your remote! I haven't used the wall hook feature yet.Overall, I'd gladly recommend this to anyone looking for a slick weighing machine to measure up to 10 kilos. And the company's ability to respond is just fantastic. Bravo!!

product: Kent Atta and Bread Maker for Home, Fully Automatic With 19 Pre-set Menu, 550w 16010 (Steel Grey)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Great for home made bread lovers
body:
First it will not save money. Its for bread makers club or for someone who is avoiding harmful chemical of bread in market. Or glutain protein.Let me say that it has to be 3 review.1. Atta maker2. For Fresher in bread making3. For experienced bread maker1. Atta - it does job well but you have to practice a little. Every flour is different & requires different quantity of water hence machine cant predict & that you have to practice. A tip, add oil if you feel its not soft & you can also increase time.2. Fresher bread maker - many review says the handbook is wrong - its not true - try simple bread 1 option. Use large scoop for sugar & oil & small for yeast & salt. You will get a perfect bread. & home made bread don't look perfect like market one... And it wont last long.Tips: get good live yeast - yeast dies if its stored long. Look for expired. Try getting fresh yeastTry bread improver - they might contain chemicals. Now enzyme(protein - analyze) is not bad. It will burn starch & will help in bread rise making it protein rich.But it should not contain large quantity of preservative or emulsifier. I tried "Urban platter V+ bread improver"& its good. Not sure of chemical quantity yet. I add a very very small pinch & it does its job.3. Expert bread maker: makes perfect bread but no custamize option bro, except general time delay. Cant customize for various stages... But we can play around if you have time. Dont bake from above so no onion bread or any that bakes topping. No fun of kneading. Thats the machine for. I love to knead... If you are looking to make many kinds of expertly made bread, then its not this. Its very good for basic & one can play around for house hold breads.Overall very good at this price.Update: try milk instead of water & dont add sugar or just a little & you will get milk bread.
Read more

product: Kent Atta and Bread Maker for Home, Fully Automatic With 19 Pre-set Menu, 550w 16010 (Steel Grey)
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Good aata maker - Product design needs some improvement
body:
I bought this primarily for making aata. I have been using this for the past two weeks and the results are pretty amazing. The kneaded dough is perfect! just like hand-kneaded dough - BUT there's a catch!Firstly the ratio specified in the recipe book is wrong. For making chappati aata the book says to add 3.5 cups of aata & 330ml water. The correct ratio is 3 cups aata & *at least* 330 ml water (although you can add slightly more water depending upon your preferences. But 3.5 cups aata just doesn't work with 330 ml water - it never comes all together)Second, the bread pan or the main utensil in which you will do all your kneading/baking has a handle attached to it and the point where the handle is attached to the bread pan has sharp edges.Third, The display where you select your program is not backlit - it should be backlit. It's 2020 & backlit displays are cheap.Fourth, When the aata maker finishes kneading the dough. The machine keeps on beeping & takes quite a while to stop. Normally there should be a stopping mechanism for the beep. Like when you open the lid the beeping should stop - like a microwave.Fifth, Sometimes you made need a second run on your aata (as in when if the dough does not get all together) in that case. You must either wait for the first run to end and the beeping to stop - which takes quite a while and then the machine resets itself to come back to usable state. OR you unplug the machine, plug it back it AND hold the start button until it resets the program menu to 1 and then you can choose your program mode (like 11 for chappati aata)Sixth, The cleaning depends upon how careful you are when you put aata/other ingredients in the bread pad. There is a substantial space between the bread pan and the machine's internal body. (Which might be necessary from an engineering standpoint - to have an even heat/airflow - for baking) But if you just carelessly throw in ingredients like aata, they might drop inside the machine and you'll have to clean it. - This cleaning can be relatively easy for dry aata but if you are making a Jam (Yes this machine can even make Jams! - amazing) in that case the cleaning might be messier.Kent was good on the followups. they sent me a text message thanking me for the purchase, They also send me 2 emails asking for a review which is why I posted this. I hope kent reads this & takes into account these points in the future versions.Verdict: Do I recommend this machine?YES 100% Aata making is very messy & tiring It took me two weeks to figure out the ratios myself to make aata according to my preferences & now it works FLAWLESSLY
Read more

product: Kent Atta and Bread Maker for Home, Fully Automatic With 19 Pre-set Menu, 550w 16010 (Steel Grey)
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Worth every Paisa!
body:
Okay so this is a must buy for every household, especially for bachelors. Let me list out some pros and cons:1) Atta kneading is flawless. Use the exact measurements specified in the recipe book (you can leave out the oil though) and the dough comes out ready to make chappatis. Like no extra work needed.2) Bread ‚ù§Ô∏è oh gosh where do I even begin. The bread this bread maker makes is just amazing, tastes much better than those bought from bakeries. You can play around with the ingredients, alternatively adding a bit of oatmeal flour, olive oil to change the taste and texture of the bread. It's so easy, even a child can make bread.3) Pizza dough when made with hands gets a bit messy. This machine makes the work so much easier in less time (1.5 hours).4) Stir fry- this is a god sent feature. You can dry roast peanuts, poha, suji, moong dal, and keep them ready for other recipes. Doing this over the gas was such a hassle.5) For baking cakes, the recipe book asks for yeast. I use a mixer grinder to combine the butter, eggs, and sugar. And then pour this mixture into the bread pan, adding the dry ingredients. Advice to add vanilla or any other essence. Then start machine in atta kneading mode, once all ingredients are combined, go for bake (30 mins should do). This is the only place where preset menu doesn't work that well so i use this method and the cakes come out flawless.Cons:The only con is that for bread, since the cooking time is high, advisable to run this just before you sleep at night and wake up to fresh and warm bread.No regrets. Recommending everyone to buy this!!

title:
1.0 out of 5 stars

body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Let's start with the great things - as a designer myself, I do really appreciate the great look and feel of the product, and its sleekness. Unfortunately, UX-wise, one gripe with it is that there's no way to manually turn it off and the only way for it to power-down is to wait for 2 straight minutes, *making sure the weight values doesn't change* but that can be challenging since it is sensitive to the slightest of air-currents (which is a good thing by design, but also results in unnecessary battery drain).What really broke the deal for me is when I realised that one fine evening, after almost exactly 4 months of *very spare* and careful usage; it just wouldn't turn on anymore. Changed the batteries, however, to no avail. It's basically dead, which makes it unreliable for the long-run.It's a great product, but it clearly has QC/QA issues.Have submitted a support ticket to Health Sense's website since the product is under warranty.Will update after a resolution, if it ever comes.

product: Amazon Brand - Solimo 650 Watt Drip Coffee Maker with Borosilicate Carafe
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Good value for a well finished product - recommended
body:
I have been using a similar coffee percolator for over 20 years now - and my old workhorse, a Chinese (Nova) is still capable. Since it was white, and therefore a very unappetising sight now, I needed a new one.Packaging: The design of packaging was perfect - stiff corrugated sandwich board box, foam profiled panels stuck on board for bottom and top, board wrapping around the glass kettle, the whole unit inside a thick ply cover. Frankly, this sort of packaging is more common in high end audio equipment. 5 * plus for the packaging design.Size: This is a small machine - and will make about 600 ml of coffee - sufficient for 2 mugs in one go. If you need a larger volume - look elsewhere.Body and finish: The plastic body is well made - the matte finish looks good. The bottom metal plate is seamless and black - will have to wait and see when spots appear. The kettle is good quality glass, and though no branding is present, feels thick enough to withstand minor washing bumps. The filter bucket and the holder with the flow control spring is OK - hopefully the spring and washer - which are fixed - will last. The lid moves smoothly and the hinges and the sprinkler also look sturdy. Switch is firm.Function: It worked very well on the first use. I had used an extra coffee filter paper on top of the nylon filter bucket. The flow was smooth. Coffee liquor starts weak, and then picks up strength. The drip stops well with the removal of the kettle - and though the manual cautiously states a 10 sec gap for drip stop, I did not find any leakage on longer removal.Overall: Very satisfied with my new coffee maker. Recommend buying.
Read more

product: Amazon Brand - Solimo 650 Watt Drip Coffee Maker with Borosilicate Carafe
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Overall works very well
body:
A nice little, affordable coffee maker. I have used Drip-Coffee Makers for years, so I know how this one lines up with others.*The carafe needs to be fully straight and centered with even the handle in the middle for the coffee to come out correctly, but that is easy enough after a few attempts.*The only negative comment that I have on it really is the reusable filter that came with it. The bottom of it is solid rather than mesh, meaning that the water cannot drip through the bottom but only through the sides. This results strangely enough in weaker coffee than using a similar-sized coffee pot with a mesh bottom to the filter, so I wind up using one TBSP of coffee more with this than I do when making the same amount of coffee in a different coffee maker.  So if you have this coffee maker, you might want to replace that part with another similarly sized one from another brand (or use paper filters instead of the reusable ones).Otherwise, it's a great little coffee maker - perfect for the office at our language school.

product: GM 3029-1 0.5-Watt Plug-in LED Night Lamp
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Serves the purpose, Have used in over-night train journey, wish was sturdy !!
body:
ABOUT THE PRODUCT - It's GM make with mere 0.5W, sleek, white coloured, 2 pin adapter night lamp which throws BRIGHT BLUE LIGHT. BRIGHT BLUE LIGHT works fine for a room which is too spacious so covering almost entire room. Is too bright for a room/space smaller in size. It hits in the eye while sleeping. Please note it substitutes and serves the purpose of foot lamp but not many people have power connection at the floor level of the space/room and so it's bright light hits in the eye when placed next to switchboard.The "blue strip" in the night lamp is "convex shaped" thus throwing light down n then reflecting upwards (indirect light).Night lamp is light in weight and very fragile - one fall from a "short height" and my stopped working so had to purchase another one. Wish it was sturdy.Travel-friendly for sure. Have used them in night train journeys and out station trips as well.It does not attract mosquitos. So no worries if using for LO's or just born babies. Night lamp was of great help when my baby was just a month old and I used to switch and leave the room while the baby was asleep.Best solution for senior citizens as well.SELLER - Sold by most trusted Seller - Cloudtail and was dispatched at the earliest after ordering.PRODUCT AVAILABILTIY - Was available easily.PRICE - Very affordable and serves the purpose. INR 110/- is peanuts in today's world.DELIVERY - Hassle free and as expected within the time frame given.PS - To curb the brightness in smaller spaces we used to block the night lamp with the help of a pen stand or book or so. But leaving a decent space between the object and night lamp. Such that in case of sparks or so nothing is damaged.**To the makers - Kindly Include the levels of light intensity from bright to dim such that it serves the purpose of many and Sturdy please !!

title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Great Buy!
body:
We had house guests for a couple of weeks. I love it when we have guests in the house, and I try to make their stay as comfortable as possible. The gentleman was a senior citizen, and he needed a night light in his room, mostly because he would go to the washroom often at night. Well, my husband and I are the sort who can't sleep if there is even a sliver of light coming in from the windows or doors - we require the room to be in complete darkness to have a good night's sleep. I purchased this particular night light mostly because of the good reviews, and also because it would be delivered almost immediately, the next day. I was amazed at the quality of the light - it served our purpose very, very well. As a bonus, it is so ridiculously cheap, that  I have no qualms about it lying around now that our guests have left!

product: Vifitkit 6mm Anti-Skid EVA+TPE Yoga Mat with Carry Bag for Home Gym & Outdoor Workout for Men & Women, Water-Resistant, Ea...
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
NOT IDEAL FOR YOGA
body:
I'm writing this review after a good 2 months of usage and i am going to give a fair one to try and help other buyers because i didn't find a decent review when i purchased this product.Here it goes,I was looking for a thick mat which provided cushioning because my previous mat was harsh on my knees being only 4mm. After a lot of research i found that foam mats are not reliable because they tear easy and they compress too much which causes instability while doing balancing postures.that's how I've landed on this mat as its not made of foam but it has a decent thickness to it.In reality, i'll give them full marks for using a material that doesn't compress and still provides decent cushioning. Its on the firmer side which i personally like but the biggest problem is that i keep slipping. THERE IS ZERO GRIP on this mat and this is what's so sad about it, i really like it on every other front but there just isn't any grip to do yoga on it.To elaborate, i keep having to pull my hands and legs closer while doing downward dog because they keep slipping and i keep falling down while trying to do warrior pose because there JUST ISN'T ANY GRIP and my leg slips.To sum it up, its a good mat to that has decent firm cushioning and seems to me like the material will last a long time unlike my other mats. BUT IT JUST ISN'T FIT FOR YOGA. there is absolutely no grip.Hope this honest review of mine helps others and warns them from wasting money on this product in search of a yoga mat.cheers!
Read more

product: PHILIPS HD2584/60 830W 2 Slice Pop Up Toaster, Green
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
Browning inconsistent. Would have been a 5 star rating but for the shortcomings mentioned.
body:
Cost me Rs.1699/- as on 17-12-18.I have awarded 3 stars for this Product because :1. It is over priced for it's overall performance.2. The cord is much to Short (33 inches)3. It was delivered in it's original Philips packing (very good), but because of the multiple transit points and changing of hands resulted in carton ripping in two places. Due to excellent Philips inner protective packing the unit was safe and unscratched. It would be advisable for Amazon to repack the original Philips packing in an Amazon carton as a precaution/prevention against damage.4. Browning on both sides of a slice is neither uniform or consistent from one slot OR from both slots of the Toaster.II. For general Specifications :1. The length of the cord is 33 inches which comes with a 3 pin 6 amp. Plug.2. The INNER measurement (which comes into contact with the bread slice) of each toast slot is 5 inches in length and 3.1 cm/1.2 inches in breadth.3. As can be seen the Toaster does not have separate Defrost or Reheat buttons but is marked alongside the numerical gradations, which I feel is a sounder technical design being more reliable than offering the additional separate buttons circuit.4. I have noticed that it gets a little stiffer when rotating the knob clockwise and at the Off position there is slight play of the knob (perhaps a Philips design and can't comment on it being a flaw or otherwise ).5. When selecting any Browning level there is no precise click fit for any number and since there is quite a gap from one number to the other it's not known whether at any point of this gap BEFORE the next browning number is it constant/consistent to that number or would there be an equivalent increase in browning corresponding to knob set within the gap between each number.6. The mechanical Stop lift mechanism is quite noisy and violent in operation and literally throws out smaller slices. So is the Pop-up sound but is more gentle in it's pop-up action.III. I have shown snap shots of the toaster's brownings from settings 1 to 8. (Had to use Stop button on number 8 as it was smoking too much and did not want to damage the unit). Size of the white bread slice used measures 4 x 4 inches. Only the one same slot was used for each slice browning at the various numerical settings.  There are two sets of photos, 1A to 8A (which shows the browning done by one side of the single slot) and the second set 1B to 8B (which shows the browning done by the other side of the same slot).Now you can evaluate/compare features/results of this Unit to similar priced Toasters. The fit and finish of the Product is very good and is a well thought of design. Simple without the body of the Toaster getting hot on consecutive repeated usage. And finally, yes, 830 watts is most optimally suited for 2 slice Toasters. I hope this covers most ofthe essential observations impartially.CLIFFORD MICHAEL
Read more

Whether it's reading, working, or simply enjoying the ambiance, the Eveready bulbs have it all covered. ‚úçÔ∏èüìö Plus, their easy installation made the transition from my old bulbs a breeze. I'd highly recommend these LED bulbs for their outstanding performance and energy efficiency. A bright 5-star choice for any well-lit space! üå†üåüThe Eveready LED Light Bulbs have truly been a game-changer in my household. With 100 Lumens per watt, they offer bright, energy-efficient lighting that makes a noticeable difference in daily tasks and mood. üí°üí™I particularly appreciate the Cool Day Light (6500K) as it provides a refreshing and vibrant atmosphere, perfect for working and reading. Plus, the added bonus of 4kv surge protection ensures these bulbs are built to last, making them a smart long-term investment. üõ°Ô∏èüëç The pack of 2 is a great value, and considering their incredible performance, these bulbs are a must-have for anyone seeking quality lighting with a long lifespan.
